title: Login button not responding on mobile devices
description: The login button becomes unresponsive on mobile devices after entering credentials. Users cannot complete the login process.
reproductionSteps:
1. Open app on mobile device
2. Navigate to login page
3. Enter valid credentials
4. Tap login button
5. Button appears pressed but no action occurs

title: Search results showing incorrect product prices
description: Product search results display outdated prices that don't match the actual product page prices.
reproductionSteps:
1. Search for any product
2. Note the price in search results
3. Click on product to view details
4. Compare prices between search and product page

title: Database connection timeout during peak hours
description: Users experience timeout errors when trying to access the application during peak traffic hours (12-2 PM and 6-8 PM).
reproductionSteps:
1. Access application during peak hours
2. Attempt to load any page
3. Connection timeout error appears after 30 seconds

title: Email notifications not sent for order confirmations
description: Customers are not receiving email confirmations after placing orders, though orders are processed successfully.
reproductionSteps:
1. Complete a product purchase
2. Wait for order confirmation email
3. Check email inbox and spam folder
4. No email received within expected timeframe

title: Cart items disappear after page refresh
description: Shopping cart contents are lost when users refresh the page or navigate away and return.
reproductionSteps:
1. Add items to shopping cart
2. Refresh the page
3. Check cart contents
4. Items are no longer present
